definitions.definition: Of a drug : having the effect of calming a person or animal , or putting them to sleep ; sedating , sedative .
Having the effect of making someone or something tranquil ; calming , soothing .

main_definition: Of a drug : having the effect of calming a person or animal , or putting them to sleep ; sedating , sedative .
secondary_definitions: ( literary ) Having the effect of making someone or something tranquil ; calming , soothing .
